title: A Ryzen 4000 Gaming Notebook You'll Probably Buy!
description: At CES 2020 everyone heard about the awesome ASUS Zephyrus G14 but we looked for something more affordable.  It turns out that when it comes to AMD Ryzen 4000-series notebooks with the 4800U, 4700U or even 4600U, the ASUS TUF Gaming A15 and A17 might provide an awesome combination of price, battery life and performance.     Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #asuszephyrusg14 #asustufgaminga17 #ces2020 #hardwarecanucks
